Package org.cid15.aem.veneer.api.link

Interface Link

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    public interface Link
extends Serializable
    A link represents the attributes that compose a URL with additional title and target properties to encapsulate the typical attributes of an HTML anchor tag.

        if href is to an external URL

      • getChildren

        List<Link> getChildren()
        List of child links. Useful for building navigation hierarchies.
        Returns:
        list of child links for this link or empty list if none exist

      • isActive

        boolean isActive()
        Returns:
        true if link is active
